sorry, forgot Lunarpine

Lunarpine knew something was going wrong at the Bl=
ack Fortress. "Thet probably entered to avoid the lava." the mirror sensors=
 and relays reflected his signal to hide his location, he had hoped it woul=
d've done the same for the others. "You can see how many we have,  so you k=
now how strong we are yet we haven't attacked."  He decided that honesty wa=
s the best policy, "I'll level with you, as you probably know Silver Scout =
has a highly contagious virus. We have the tools to help her where your kin=
d could easily be wiped out if the virus gets out." he watched the screen, =
the defenses still hadn't found him, that at least could work in his favor.=
 "I suggest that you raise your base, release the bot, and in return I'll g=
ive you the vial with the cure." He knew there was no cure, he'd hoped that=
 the Preds would think there might be.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fr=
om: Airshadow Nightlight 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, Aug=
ust 12, 2001 5:02 PM
  Subject: Ender/Mutants.


  Shivah/BlackFortress: 

=
  Shivah looked to Ender and said "I should admit, Ender, that that thing t=
hat I've done was pretty unpleasant" said Shivah camly and he added "Well E=
nder what of those factions are worthy as allies? we need more allies, I ha=
ve the feeling that we will need them" 

  BlackFortress defences started t=
o act, several slide plates  appeared  from  the top of BlackFortress (BF i=
s a dome) and  they covered all BlackFortress, even those plates close the =
hole that Foxfingers and Razorclaws have done; That  was a extra  protectio=
n  that BlackFortress has, if some one have opened a hole in extermal shiel=
d, this plates will cover the damage at the same time that protect all Blac=
kFortress. Letting the BlackFortress members repair the damage while the Fo=
rtress in under Lava. 

  Foxfingers and Razorclaws where in a corritor and=
 two slider walls  block the two directions that they could have followed. =
Now both was trapped  and from roof started to rain Acyd, that could destro=
y organic and metallic creatures. 

  Shivah smiled when BlackFortress comp=
uter report that and said to Lunarpine "If you are a paceful group, why are=
 two bots trapped inside BlackFortress?'?? I've told you that you shouldn't=
 try anything... now your two friends will die due your impertinence!!!!!" =


  Now BlackFortress was covered by the lava.
